about.title: We Are CruzHacks
about.body: CruzHacks is a hackathon that rewards new ideas and innovationâ€” hackers have the chance to use creative and problem-solving skills to address real-world challenges. Open to individuals with any level of experience, Cruzhacks provides the opportunity to apply knowledge and use industry-leading tools to make an impact.

mission.title: The CruzHacks Mission
mission.body: CruzHacks is a global event where people can collaborate, network, and wield technology to solve problems! Our initiative is to expand diversity in tech by sparking the drive to innovate within all our participants.
